languages.text: {n}Идира молчит несколько секунд перед ответом — а потом картинно закатывает глаза.{/n} "Знаете... Леди Теодора плевать хотела, замерили ли мне какие-то умники мозги или нет. Дело не в печати на лбу, смекаете? Дело в том, какое у тебя нутро — гнилое или нет. У меня нутро тверже адамантиума на этом корабле. И {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланты{/g} получше тех, которые втыкают на этой вашей {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Терре{/g}. Иначе бы я просто не дожила до своих лет". {n}Идира зло оскаливается, ее глаза лихорадочно блестят.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира молчит несколько секунд перед ответом — а потом картинно закатывает глаза.{/n} "Знаете... леди Теодора плевать хотела, замерили ли мне какие-то умники мозги или нет. Дело не в печати на лбу, смекаете? Дело в том, какое у тебя нутро — гнилое или нет. У меня нутро тверже адамантия на этом корабле. И {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланты{/g} получше тех, которые втыкают на этой вашей {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Терре{/g}. Иначе бы я просто не дожила до своих лет". {n}Идира зло оскаливается, ее глаза лихорадочно блестят.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Idira says nothing for a few seconds, and then exaggeratedly rolls her eyes.{/n} "Look... Lady Theodora couldn't care less if some eggheads measured my brains or not. It's not about the seal on your forehead, get it? It's about what's in your gut — if it's rotten or not. My gut's stronger than the adamantine on this here ship. And my {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are better than the ones they put in you on your {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}. If they weren't, I wouldn't have lived as long as I have." {n}Idira bares her teeth in a savage grin, a febrile gleam in her eye.{/n}

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉沉默了几秒钟，之后夸张地翻了个白眼。{/n}“你看……西奥多拉夫人才不在乎有没有哪个书呆子测量过我的大脑。你明白吗？重要的并不是你的脑门上有没有打过什么印章，重要的是你肚子里有什么，那些东西有没有烂。我的肚子比这艘船上的精金还要结实，而我的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}比他们在{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}泰拉{/g}的那些也要更好，不然我也活不到现在。”{n}伊迪拉露出牙齿，露出了野性的笑容，眼中闪烁着热切的光芒。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira says nothing for a few seconds, and then exaggeratedly rolls her eyes.{/n} "Look... Lady Theodora couldn't care less if some eggheads measured my brains or not. It's not about the seal on your forehead, get it? It's about what's in your gut — if it's rotten or not. My gut's stronger than the adamantine on this here ship. And my {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are better than the ones they put in you on your {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}. If they weren't, I wouldn't have lived as long as I have." {n}Idira bares her teeth in a savage grin, a febrile gleam in her eye.{/n}

languages.original_text: {n}Idira says nothing for a few seconds, and then exaggeratedly rolls her eyes.{/n} "Look... Lady Theodora couldn't care less if some eggheads measured my brains or not. It's not about the seal on your forehead, get it? It's about what's in your gut — if it's rotten or not. My gut's stronger than the adamantine on this here ship. And my implants are better than the ones they put in you on your Terra. If they weren't, I wouldn't have lived as long as I have." {n}Idira bares her teeth in a savage grin, a febrile gleam in her eye.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Idira no responde durante unos segundos, y después alza al mirada al techo de forma exagerada.{/n} «Mire... a lady Theodora no le importaba si los lumbreras habían medido mi cerebro o no. No se trata de tener un sello en la frente, ¿sabe? Se trata de lo que haya en tu interior, de si está podrido o no. Y yo soy más fuerte que el blindaje adamantino de esta nave. Y mis {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} son mejores que los que ponen en {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}. Si no fuera así, no habría sobrevivido hasta ahora». {n}Idira enseña los dientes en una sonrisa salvaje, con un brillo febril en la mirada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira says nothing for a few seconds, and then exaggeratedly rolls her eyes.{/n} "Look... Lady Theodora couldn't care less if some eggheads measured my brains or not. It's not about the seal on your forehead, get it? It's about what's in your gut — if it's rotten or not. My gut's stronger than the adamantine on this here ship. And my {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are better than the ones they put in you on your {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}. If they weren't, I wouldn't have lived as long as I have." {n}Idira bares her teeth in a savage grin, a febrile gleam in her eye.{/n}

No se trata de tener un sello en la frente, ¿sabe? Se trata de lo que haya en tu interior, de si está podrido o no. Y yo soy más fuerte que el blindaje adamantino de esta nave. Y mis {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} son mejores que los que ponen en {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}. Si no fuera así, no habría sobrevivido hasta ahora». {n}Idira enseña los dientes en una sonrisa salvaje, con un brillo febril en la mirada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}イディラは数秒間何も言わず、それから大げさに目を丸くした。{/n}「そうね…テオドラ様は、私の頭脳を測定する愚か者がいようといまいと、気にすることはなかったわ。額の封は関係ない。腸が腐っているかどうかなの。私の腸は、この船に積まれているアダマンチウムよりも丈夫よ。それに私の{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}地球{/g}であなたに入れられたものよりも優れている。そうじゃなかったら、こんなに長く生きられなかったわ」{n}イディラは歯を剥き出しにして野蛮な笑みを浮かべた。その目には熱病のような輝きがあった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira says nothing for a few seconds, and then exaggeratedly rolls her eyes.{/n} "Look... Lady Theodora couldn't care less if some eggheads measured my brains or not. It's not about the seal on your forehead, get it? It's about what's in your gut — if it's rotten or not. My gut's stronger than the adamantine on this here ship. And my {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are better than the ones they put in you on your {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}. If they weren't, I wouldn't have lived as long as I have." {n}Idira bares her teeth in a savage grin, a febrile gleam in her eye.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは数秒間何も言わず、それから大げさに目を丸くした。{/n}「そうね…テオドラ様は、私の頭脳を測定する愚か者がいようといまいと、気にすることはなかったわ。額の封は関係ない。腸が腐っているかどうかなの。私の腸は、この船に積まれているアダマンチウムよりも丈夫よ。それに私の{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}地球{/g}であなたに入れられたものよりも優れている。そうじゃなかったら、こんなに長く生きられなかったわ」{n}イディラは歯を剥き出しにして野蛮な笑みを浮かべた。その目には熱病のような輝きがあった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Idira sagt einige Sekunden lang nichts und rollt dann übertrieben mit den Augen.{/n} "Wisst Ihr ... Lady Theodora war es völlig gleichgültig, ob irgendwelche Eierköpfe mein Gehirn vermessen oder nicht. Es geht nicht darum, welches Siegel man auf der Stirn trägt. Es geht um das Innere — ob es verdorben ist oder nicht. Mein Inneres ist stärker als das Adamant auf diesem Schiff. Und meine {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantate{/g} sind besser als die, die man Euch auf Eurem {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} eingesetzt hat. Wären sie es nicht, hätte ich nicht so lange überleben können." {n}Idira fletscht die Zähne zu einem wilden Grinsen. In ihren Augen liegt ein fieberhafter Glanz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira says nothing for a few seconds, and then exaggeratedly rolls her eyes.{/n} "Look... Lady Theodora couldn't care less if some eggheads measured my brains or not. It's not about the seal on your forehead, get it? It's about what's in your gut — if it's rotten or not. My gut's stronger than the adamantine on this here ship. And my {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are better than the ones they put in you on your {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}. If they weren't, I wouldn't have lived as long as I have." {n}Idira bares her teeth in a savage grin, a febrile gleam in her eye.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira sagt einige Sekunden lang nichts und rollt dann übertrieben mit den Augen.{/n} "Wisst Ihr ... Lady Theodora war es völlig gleichgültig, ob irgendwelche Eierköpfe mein Gehirn vermessen oder nicht. Es geht nicht darum, welches Siegel man auf der Stirn trägt. Es geht um das Innere — ob es verdorben ist oder nicht. Mein Inneres ist stärker als das Adamant auf diesem Schiff. Und meine {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantate{/g} sind besser als die, die man Euch auf Eurem {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} eingesetzt hat. Wären sie es nicht, hätte ich nicht so lange überleben können." {n}Idira fletscht die Zähne zu einem wilden Grinsen. In ihren Augen liegt ein fieberhafter Glanz.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Idira reste silencieuse pendant quelques secondes, puis lève ostensiblement les yeux au ciel.{/n} « Écoutez... Dame Théodora ne s'est jamais souciée de savoir si des scientifiques m'avaient mesuré le cerveau ou non. On n'est pas définis par le sceau qui nous barre le front, vous voyez ce que je veux dire ? Ce qui compte, c'est ce qu'on a dans les tripes ; si c'est pourri ou pas. Mes tripes à moi sont plus solides que l'adamantine de ce vaisseau et mes {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} sont bien supérieurs à ceux de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}. Sinon, ça ferait bien longtemps que je ne serais plus de ce monde, » {n}ajoute Idira avec un sourire sauvage, une lueur fébrile dans le regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira says nothing for a few seconds, and then exaggeratedly rolls her eyes.{/n} "Look... Lady Theodora couldn't care less if some eggheads measured my brains or not. It's not about the seal on your forehead, get it? It's about what's in your gut — if it's rotten or not. My gut's stronger than the adamantine on this here ship. And my {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are better than the ones they put in you on your {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}. If they weren't, I wouldn't have lived as long as I have." {n}Idira bares her teeth in a savage grin, a febrile gleam in her eye.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira reste silencieuse pendant quelques secondes, puis lève ostensiblement les yeux au ciel.{/n} « Écoutez... Dame Théodora ne s'est jamais souciée de savoir si des scientifiques m'avaient mesuré le cerveau ou non. On n'est pas définis par le sceau qui nous barre le front, vous voyez ce que je veux dire ? Ce qui compte, c'est ce qu'on a dans les tripes ; si c'est pourri ou pas. Mes tripes à moi sont plus solides que l'adamantine de ce vaisseau et mes {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} sont bien supérieurs à ceux de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}. Sinon, ça ferait bien longtemps que je ne serais plus de ce monde, » {n}ajoute Idira avec un sourire sauvage, une lueur fébrile dans le regard.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İdira'nın ağzından saniyeler boyunca bir şey çıkmıyor. Ardından abartılı bir şekilde gözlerini deviriyor.{/n} "Bak, üç beş dirsek çürütmüşün beynimi enine boyuna incelemiş olması, Leydi Theodora'nın umurunda değildi. Alnındaki mührün önemi yok yani. Mühim olan, yürektir. Asıl sorun, orası çürükse başlar. Benim yüreğimse bu gemideki adamantiyumdan bile sağlamdır. Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantlarım{/g} da {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra'da{/g} sana yerleştirdiklerine bin basar. Öyle olmasa bu kadar yaşamazdım zaten." {n}İdira, vahşice sırıtarak dişlerini gösteriyor. Gözlerinde hummalı bir parıltı oluşuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira says nothing for a few seconds, and then exaggeratedly rolls her eyes.{/n} "Look... Lady Theodora couldn't care less if some eggheads measured my brains or not. It's not about the seal on your forehead, get it? It's about what's in your gut — if it's rotten or not. My gut's stronger than the adamantine on this here ship. And my {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are better than the ones they put in you on your {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}. If they weren't, I wouldn't have lived as long as I have." {n}Idira bares her teeth in a savage grin, a febrile gleam in her eye.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira'nın ağzından saniyeler boyunca bir şey çıkmıyor. Ardından abartılı bir şekilde gözlerini deviriyor.{/n} "Bak... Kafası çalışan üç beş zibidi çıkıp beynimi enine boyuna incelese bile Leydi Theodora'nın umurunda olmaz. Alnındaki mührün önemi yok, anladın mı? Cesaret önemli. İşe yarayıp yaramadığına bakarlar. Benim cesaretim, bu gemideki adamantiyumu bile geride bırakacak kadar güçlüdür. {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}İmplantlar{/g}ım ise {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}'da sana yerleştirdiklerinden katbekat iyi. Aksi hâlde bu kadar yaşamazdım zaten." {n}İdira, vahşice sırıtarak dişlerini gösteriyor. Gözleri coşkuyla parıldıyor.{/n}
